HERO.SUBTITLE: We open new horizons in financing through the latest financial technologies

COMPLIANCE.TITLE: Committed to Islamic Sharia Law
COMPLIANCE.SUBTITLE: We adhere to the principles and rulings of Islamic Sharia through a dedicated committee of qualified scholars.

BOX_1.TITLE: Review of All Agreements, Contracts, and Operations
BOX_1.DESC: The Sharia Committee reviews and approves all documents related to the company's operations.

BOX_2.TITLE: Ongoing Monitoring of Company Activities
BOX_2.DESC: The Sharia Committee performs regular reviews to ensure our continuous commitment to Sharia compliance.

CTA.SUBTITLE: Takween Finance

BOX_1.TITLE: Get a quick financing offer and track the process from your account

BOX_2.TITLE: Get funding quickly thanks to our technologies

BOX_3.TITLE: We work with you to structure the payment plan to suit your cash flow

FAQ.ACCORDION_TITLE: We accompany you on your investment journey

Q1.QUESTION: Is the company authorized?
Q1.ANSWER: Yes, the company is authorized by the Capital Market Authority under the FinTech Lab

Q3.QUESTION: Can I withdraw anytime?
Q3.ANSWER: It depends on the terms of each investment opportunity

Q4.QUESTION: Are profits guaranteed?
Q4.ANSWER: No, all investments carry some degree of risk

LICENCE.DESCRIPTION: Takween Financial Company is licensed by the Capital Market Authority within the Financial Technology Lab.
